no-perm.title: No Permission
no-perm.description: You must have the `%1` permission to run this command!

set-color.main: Set the color of your card.

give-xp.main: Give XP to a user (or yourself).
give-xp.xp: The amount of XP to give

remove-xp.main: Remove XP from a user (or yourself).
remove-xp.xp: The amount of XP to remove

rank.main: Display the rank card of a user.

top.main: Display a leaderboard with the top active users.

notify.main: Notify a user who has deafen enabled.
notify.user: A user in your channel with deafen

message.main: Make KoukBot say whatever you want!
message.channel: A specific text channel to send the message

say.main: Make Kouk say whatever you want!

evil-say.main: Make evil Kouk say whatever you want!

clear.count: The number of messages to delete

play.search: A search term/URL for KoukBot to play

description.notify: The mentioned user has been notified
description.message: The message has been sent to the specified channel.

set-color.own: You have updated your color to %1

set-perm.allow: You have given the permission %1 to the role %2
set-perm.deny: You have taken the permission %1 from the role %2
set-perm.clear: You have cleared the permission %1 from the role %2

description.clear: You have cleared %1 message%2 from this channel
help: Here is a list of all the available commands:
`/give-xp` - Gives you or another user xp.
`/remove-xp` - Removes xp from you or from another user.
`/todo` - Creates a todo for you until you declare it as done.
`/setperm` - Allow/Deny a permission from a role.
`/setcolor` - Sets the color of your user card.
`/notify` - Notify a user while they are deafened.
description.todo: Check out your new task on your todo channel!

description.unknown-error: An unknown error has occurred! Please contact the developer!

play.not-playing: KatsarosBot is not currently playing any music!
play.already-playing: KatsarosBot is already playing some music!
play.not-in-channel: You must be in a voice channel to play music!
play.not-in-your-channel: Someone else is using KatsarosBot to play music in another voice channel!
play.song-not-found: The song you requested could not be found!
play.no-matches: We couldn't find any videos matching your search query!
play.error-playing: There was an error adding your video to the queue. Please try again later!

set-perm.already-has: This role already has this permission!

set-color.not-a-color: Please provide a valid hex color code.

notify.not-in-your-channel: This user is not in your voice channel!
notify.not-in-channel: This user is not in a voice channel!
notify.user-not-in-channel: You are not currently in a channel!

moviepoll.not-active:
Movie poll is not currently active. 
To start it please run the command `/moviepoll start <duration>`
moviepoll.already-active:
Movie poll is already active. 
To stop it please run the command `/moviepoll stop`

announcer.lesson:
Ει %1, έχεις μάθημα σε 5'
Το μάθημα σας είναι: %2
Άντε πάρε και το link: %3

start-message.title: Δημιούργησε το ψηφιακό σου πρόγραμμα!
start-message.description:
Βάλε το εβδομαδιαίο σου πρόγραμμα και πάρε
ένα ψηφιακό αντίγραφο του!

already-creating.title: Δημιουργείς ήδη ένα πρόγραμμα
already-creating.description: Αφού το τελειώσεις επέστρεψε για να ξεκινήσεις καινούριο

program-creator.started: %1 πήγαινε στο κανάλι %2 για να ξεκινήσεις!

first.title: Καλώς ήρθες στην δημιουργία του προγράμματος σου!
first.description:
Απάντησε σε κάθε ερώτηση κάνοντας react σε αυτό το μήνυμα κάθε φορά!

Τί είδους πρόγραμμα δημιουργείς?

color.title: Χρώμα περιγράμματος
color.description: Τι χρώμα επιθυμείς να έχει το περίγραμμα το προγράμματος σου?

canceled.title: Το πρόγραμμα σου ακυρώθηκε.
canceled.description:
Έχεις ακυρώσει την δημιουργία αυτόυ του προγράμματος!
Αυτο το κανάλι θα διαγραφεί σε 10 δευτερόλεπτα!

completed.title: Το πρόγραμμα σου ολοκληρώθηκε!
completed.description: Θα λάβεις το πρόγραμμα σου εδώ σε μορφή φωτογραφίας σε περίπου 5-10 δευτερόλεπτα. Έχεις 5 λεπτά να το αποθηκεύσεις πριν διαγραφεί

new.title: **NEW TO-DO FOR:** __%1__
new.description:
Task: %1

Click the button below to complete this task!

not-your-task.title: Not your task
not-your-task.description: This task belongs to another user!

level-up: Παιδιά εγώ σας έχω για το καλύτερο τμήμα..
